abstract: The Deal Professor looks at how PepsiCo has an incentive to avoid taking action in its bid for Pepsi Bottling that puts the offer into entire fairness review under Delaware law.
snippet: The Deal Professor looks at how PepsiCo has an incentive to avoid taking action in its bid for Pepsi Bottling that puts the offer into entire fairness review under Delaware law.
lead_paragraph: PepsiCo’s bid for Pepsi Bottling Group has had a few developments in recent weeks. However, none of these appear to be working in Pepsi’s favor. They also raise a more interesting issue: the peculiar role of Delaware law in deciding this takeover battle.

headline.main: Pepsi Bottling: The Entire Fairness Issue
